education.institution: College of Engineering (CIT), Carnegie Mellon University
education.area: Mechanical Engineering with an additional major in Robotics
education.studyType: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering

work.name: CMU Intelligent Autonomous Manipulation Lab
work.summary: Research focused on adaptive robotic grasping and autonomous manipulation for agricultural applications.
highlights: Designed a compliant two-finger gripper for adaptive grasping, improving success rate by 17%.
Developed a reliable funneling mechanism, enhancing alignment precision by 76%.
Implemented visual servoing with Mask R-CNN, reducing median distance from the center by 38.2%.
Led system integration and field deployment for cornstalk nitrate monitoring.

work.name: Samsung Electronics Global Technology Research
work.summary: Integrated advanced robotic grippers into Samsung's industrial robotic systems.
highlights: Designed a custom gripper mount for seamless integration.
Established Ethernet communication and developed user-friendly motion control functions.

work.name: Smith + Nephew Medical Robotics
work.summary: Enhanced safety and functionality of robotic tools for knee and hip surgeries.
highlights: Developed test fixtures for electrical safety and performance validation.
Performed extensive testing of handheld robotic surgical tools.

work.name: Carnegie Mellon University
work.summary: Supported the development of student-led projects and course materials in medical robotics and mechanical design.
highlights: Mentored semester-long, student-led group projects in Medical Robotics during Fall 2023, aiding in the design and development of innovative medical robotic systems.
Facilitated weekly office hours, managed grading, and guided group projects for Mechanical Design: Methods and Applications during Fall 2022 and Spring 2023.
Assisted with homework and supervised projects focusing on designing assistive robotic products.

awards.title: Best Presenter
awards.awarder: Smith + Nephew Annual Intern Poster Competition
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding presentation on robotic innovations.

publications.name: Autonomous Sensor Exchange and Calibration for Cornstalk Nitrate Monitoring Robot
publications.summary: Proposed methodologies for sensor insertion and calibration in agricultural robotics.

publications.name: Autonomous Sensor Insertion and Exchange for Cornstalk Monitoring Robot
publications.summary: Thesis on developing robotic systems for autonomous monitoring in agriculture.

publications.name: A Computational Approach for Contactless Muscle Force and Strain Estimations in Distributed Actuation Biohybrid Mesh Constructs
publications.publisher: Conference on Biomimetic and Biohybrid Systems
publications.summary: Presents computational methods for biohybrid actuation systems.
